items.sentence: I don\'t think that anyone suspected that you weren\'t Tom.
Tom thought Mary was moving to Boston, but he was mistaken.
The waiters bumped into each other and dropped their trays.
Police believe that Tom was somehow involved in the murder.
I couldn\'t see Tom\'s face, but I was sure he was smiling.
It\'s clear Tom doesn\'t want to deal with it at this time.
It\'s possible that Tom doesn\'t know how to unclog a sink.
On a hot day like this, the laundry will be dry in no time.
I couldn\'t understand the announcement that was just made.
I guess I could call Tom and ask him to come over and help.
I thought I told you I didn\'t want you to do that anymore.
Tom asked Mary about the accident that she was involved in.
Tom became bored with teaching and he looked for a new job.
Tom said it wasn\'t as difficult to do that as he expected.
I can\'t believe that Tom is really planning on doing this.
I can\'t help you move the piano because I have a bad back.
I don\'t understand why you hang out with Tom all the time.
Both Tom and Mary were very skinny when they were children.
Department stores are always crowded just before Christmas.
The police were able to link Tom\'s DNA to the crime scene.
